title: VEN Studio
description: VEN Studio is a CRM solution developed using Laravel, designed specifically for managing operations and client relationships in a dancing studio.

title: PromoTrans
description: Website for freight transport in Ukraine. I was not fully involved in the development, but optimized the site, translated its content, and made various enhancements to improve functionality and user experience.

title: Osanclinic
description: Osanclinic is a medical center where I participated in the improvement and optimization of the website, including improving its functionality and performance.
